subject: United States Figure Skating Championships
Skeleton (Sport)
Luge Racing
Ski Jumping
Bobsledding
Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Felix Neureuther overcame a big first-run deficit to win a World Cup giant slalom, his second straight victory in 2014. Ted Ligety, who was poised to take the lead, skied out.
snippet: Felix Neureuther overcame a big first-run deficit to win a World Cup giant slalom, his second straight victory in 2014. Ted Ligety, who was poised to take the lead, skied out.
